img.alt: A low problem score, shown in Insights

problem.p: Imagine that your course dashboard shows you a problem where students are receiving an unexpectedly low score. What might this indicate? Select all that apply.

checkboxgroup.label: What might this indicate?
checkboxgroup.choice: The problem is more difficult than anticipated
The students are not working very hard
The problem does not assess what is being taught
The problem relies on a cultural reference, but the course has an audience that does not understand it.

div.p: All of these are possible answers! These dashboards will only give you an idea of where a problem might be happening; not necesarily what the problem is.
